title: MCP Tool Fetcher
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) fetcher that uses external tools for content retrieval. Allows integration with custom fetching tools through the MCP interface.

id.title: MCP Server ID
id.description: Identifier of the MCP server to use for fetching content.

tool.title: Tool Name
tool.description: Name of the MCP tool to invoke for content fetching.

arguments_mapping.title: Arguments Mapping
arguments_mapping.description: Mapping of fetch parameters to MCP tool arguments.

url.title: URL Argument
url.description: MCP tool argument name for the URL to fetch.

method.title: Method Argument
method.description: MCP tool argument name for HTTP method.

headers.title: Headers Argument
headers.description: MCP tool argument name for HTTP headers.

timeout.title: Timeout Argument
timeout.description: MCP tool argument name for request timeout.

user_agent.title: User Agent Argument
user_agent.description: MCP tool argument name for user agent string.

follow_redirects.title: Follow Redirects Argument
follow_redirects.description: MCP tool argument name for redirect following option.

result_mapping.title: Result Mapping
result_mapping.description: Mapping of MCP tool response fields to fetch results.

content.title: Content Field
content.description: Response field containing the fetched content.

url.title: URL Field
url.description: Response field containing the final URL (after redirects).

status_code.title: Status Code Field
status_code.description: Response field containing the HTTP status code.

headers.title: Headers Field
headers.description: Response field containing the response headers.

content_type.title: Content Type Field
content_type.description: Response field containing the content type.

content_length.title: Content Length Field
content_length.description: Response field containing the content length.

notification_mapping.title: Notification Mapping
notification_mapping.description: Mapping for MCP notification handling during fetching.

progress.title: Progress Notification
progress.description: Notification type for fetch progress updates.
